resources.string: LEAN AND GREEN MEAL REPLACEMENT SMOOTHIE
LEAN AND GREEN MEAL REPLACEMENT SMOOTHIE

• Blackberry - 1 cup 
 • Kiwifruit - 1 
 • Pear - 1 medium size 
 • Peppermint (optional) 10 leaves 
 • Quarter Pineapple (peeled, cored)
• Process all ingredients in a juicer or blender(juicer is preferred method) \n • Shake or stir and serve.

• cup almond milk 
 • 1/2 cup full-fat cottage cheese 
 • 3 tbsp peanut butter 
 • 2 scoops low-carb chocolate protein powder 
 • Additional no-carb sweetener to taste
• Pour ingredients into blender. \n • Blend until desired thickness. \n • Enjoy!

• 1 scoop Lean Body Natural Protein 
 • 1 cup chopped kale 
 • 1/2 small avocado 
 • 1/3 banana 
 • 1/4 cup pineapple 
 • 3 strawberries (raw or freshly frozen) 
 • Small bundle of wheatgrass (about 1/4 oz) 
 • 1/4 cup water
• Add ingredients to a blender and mix until smooth. \n • Instead of using ice, you can freeze the fruit to chill the smoothie.

• 1/2 cup Pineapple, chopped 
 • 1/2 frozen Banana 
 • 1 scoop Vanilla Protein 
 • 1/2 cup Unsweetened Coconut Milk 
 • 1/2 cup Water and Crushed Ice
• Add all ingredients to a blender. \n • Blend, pour, and enjoy!

• 3 scoops Clutch Bodyshop Protein Powder 
 • 2 cups ice 
 • 4 oz coconut milk 
 • 1/3 cup cooked and peeled sweet potato 
 • Cinnamon, nutmeg and pumpkin spice seasoning (to taste) 
 • 1 tbsp raw almond butter 
 v Stevia to taste
• Add all ingredients to a blender. \n • Blend, pour, and enjoy!

• Carrots - 2 large 
 • Celery - 3 stalk, large 
 • Cucumber - 1/2 cucumber 
 • Parsley - 2 handful 
 • Green Pepper - 1 medium size 
 • Spinach - 1 cup 
 • Tomatoes - 3 medium size
• Process all ingredients in a juicer, shake or stir and serve. \n • NOTE: If using a blender then add 8 oz water(1 cup) and blend very well.
• Apples - 5 medium \n • Celery - 2 stalk, large \n • Oranges (peeled) - 2 fruit
• Process all ingredients in a juicer, shake or stir and serve. \n • NOTE: If using a blender then add 8 oz water(1 cup) and blend very well.
• Coconut (meat only) \n • Oranges - 2 large \n • Peaches - 2 medium
• Process all ingredients in a juicer, shake or stir and serve. \n • NOTE: If using a blender then add 8 oz water(1 cup) and blend very well.
